extension.description: Emotional support for developers when their code fails.
view.container.title: Self Esteem
view.media.title: Encouragement
configuration.title: Self Esteem Linter
configuration.enabled.description: Enable or disable Self Esteem Linter.
configuration.streakThreshold1.descripti: First streak threshold for a supportive warning message.
configuration.streakThreshold2.descripti: Second streak threshold for a supportive info message.
configuration.cooldownSeconds.descriptio: Minimum seconds between any two messages.
configuration.celebrateOnRecovery.descri: Show a celebration message when errors drop to zero after a streak.
configuration.showMedia.description: Show a button that opens the encouragement view in the sidebar.
configuration.focusMode.enabled.descript: Reduce notifications by enforcing a minimum interval between messages.
Minimum minutes between messages while Focus Mode is enabled.
configuration.soundOnRecovery.descriptio: Play a soft sound when recovering (requires sidebar view opened at least once).
configuration.messages.threshold1.descri: Custom message for the first threshold. Use {streak} and {file}. Leave blank for default.
configuration.messages.threshold2.descri: Custom message for the second threshold. Use {streak} and {file}. Leave blank for default.
configuration.messages.recovery.descript: Custom message for recovery. Use {streak} and {file}. Leave blank for default.
